Reviews.Title: Horrible, don't waste your money!
Reviews.Author: BusyMom "Kristina"
Reviews.Content: This is the very first review I've ever written for Amazon, but this camera is SO BAD that I had to.Camera does not have a real lens so even though it may be able to store 10MP images, they are 10MP of terribly blurry images. Videos are just as bad.It was given as a gift and we have no way of returning so I guess we will just be giving it to a toddler to play with.So if you are looking for a good little camera, look elsewhere, I bought my other daughter a 8MP Kodak last year for less than $50 wish I could trade this one.

Reviews.Title: Utter Crap
Reviews.Author: Ben Eberle
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because it appeared to be a cheap camera with a fairly high quality picture. In reality it gives you extremely high res pictures of utter crap quality. It's barely better than the camera on my phone, which isn't even a blackberry/iphone/droid - it's a basic phone. Not much more needs to be said - it's crap.

Reviews.Title: What was that a picture of again?
Reviews.Author: Joseph Carter
Reviews.Content: That's the question I kept asking when taking pictures with this camera.  Images were not of the best quality.  My Motorola Droid I takes way better pictures.  A definite disappointment.

Reviews.Title: About What You Would Expect
Reviews.Author: Horace
Reviews.Content: I was out-of-town and came across a scene I wished to photograph, but was caught without my camera.  I purchased the Vivitar 018 locally.  In ideal outdoor lighting the camera performed admirably and captured the scene as I visualized it.  The Vivitar performs well under ideal outdoor conditions.  Indoor performance is horrible, but I didn't expect anything more for what I paid for the camera and after I read the specifications.  You pretty much get what you pay for.  Remember, under ideal conditions and with the correct settings, this camera will give you a decent photograph.  But don't expect it to perform like a more expensive and feature-rich digital compact.  It is a "fun" camera, not one for serious photography.

Reviews.Title: Not Worth It
Reviews.Author: JadeKiss23
Reviews.Content: I didn't order this camera from this site, but got it from Wal Mart, and I gotta say, this camera is junk. The photos come out extremely blurry and there is no internal storage. I ended up returning the thing to the store for my money back. I was looking for something cheap and decent to replacement mine that had died. While I guess you get what you pay for because the pictures I took with this camera made the people in them look like something from a low budget horror film. Sections were blacked out and others just blurry. Also the feature with the flip around display does no good, it doesnt flip the display on the device, so you still end up turning the whole camera upside down. Really save yourself some trouble and dont buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Rivera
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA SUCKS! pics are all grainy & fuzzy. no complaint against amazon as it was delivered prompt. But the camera is a piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: Vivicam VX018 Blueberry 10.1MP 1.8IN Screen 8X Dig Zoom 3XAAA
Reviews.Author: Danny Jimenez Vega
Reviews.Content: this camera Vivicam VX018 Blueberry 10.1MP 1.8IN Screen 8X Dig Zoom 3XAAA ts really a toy, we dont recomendt this

Reviews.Title: Not user friendly at all
Reviews.Author: sweetly1
Reviews.Content: the directions are very hard to follow. it feels and looks like a cheaply made product despite the price i paid for it. i am completely unsatisfied.Vivicam VX018 Blueberry 10.1MP 1.8IN Screen 8X Dig Zoom 3XAAA

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE PURCHASE
Reviews.Author: Lacey
Reviews.Content: I took a couple pictures when I first got this camera to see what the pictures would look like and they're horrible. They're blurry and just horrible quality. The memory is also really low, one picture fills up the camera so you have to have a memory card. I would buy this camera for a cheap gift to give to a kid, not something I would use for myself. I do not suggest buying this camera, spend a little more money and purchase something worth what your spending. This camera is a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Not for everyone but definitely worth the LOW PRICE
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: It's not the Best camera, but what do you expect for the price?  as a cheap backup (maybe in the car just in case an emergency happens) or for children or young teens its absolutely perfect.  Not every picture you take has to be DSLR quality!!  I really like it.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Johntee82
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera and when I got it I just knew that everythng about it was going to be perfect. That was not the case at all. I recieved my camera and began to notice that the outside quality of it was very cheap in style, I also have a 20 dollar Slick camera and that camera has better quality than this one does. I turned the camera on and it worked for about 20 mins and then shut off and never came back on. No matter what I did, I brought new battries, tried a new memory card, Everything! I called customer service and they told me that there was nothing they could do about it since it was refurbished and that they were sorry that this happened to me. Whatever you do please DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA! It's a waste of time and your money.  Also Customer Service Sucks Big Time!

Reviews.Title: not satisfied
Reviews.Author: Shalini
Reviews.Content: This camera looks like a toy..picture quality is not soo good. Am not satisfied with this product. Its mere waste of money

Reviews.Title: pass up this camera
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: it should have been obvious from the packaging of this "camera" it is self service blister packaging and i think should have not bothered to open it.if you photograph yourself you will not appear on the screen or transfering your image with a card reader as you really look.it is unsuited for portrait images.also if you position the camera in the vertical (portrait) orientation your image appears upside down on the viewing screen.i ordered it because of the 180 degree screen swivel but due to the poor image quality it's useless.

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: Jessie Rasheed
Reviews.Content: thank you very much it was a birthday present fo my granddaughter and she realy loves it she takes pics all the time.

Reviews.Title: Depends on what you pay
Reviews.Author: Salakatae
Reviews.Content: Well i bought mines today from a discount store and paid 15 dollars. For that price I am happy because I did buy it for my 3 year old. He takes tons of pictures with my cell phone camera and actually arranges first whatever he is taking a picture of. So if you can get it for a cheap price it is not a bad deal.

Reviews.Title: lies about optical zoom
Reviews.Author: Baxter
Reviews.Content: They lie about the optical zoom. It is not 8x optical zoom...it is only 4x....HUGE differance if that was the case i would not have bought this camera

ProductInfo.Features:
10.1 Megapixel resolution
Anti-shake
Red eye reduction tools
4x Digital Zoom
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar ViviCam X018 - Blueberry (VX018-BLU)
